name: Terrorizing Display
prerequisiteFormula: @feat:dazzling_display AND @feat:demoralizing_lash AND @feat:taskmaster AND @feat:weapon_focus AND @skill:intimidate >= 10 AND @race:hobgoblin AND @proficiency:selected_weapon
descriptionText: Your battle prowess frightens friend and foe alike.
benefitText: When you use Dazzling Display, in addition to its normal effects, you can use it to spur allies within 30 feet as if you had used the Taskmaster feat. Use the same Intimidate check to determine the effects of Dazzling Display and this feat.
